Detailed Description

Finds the N highest valued-pixels in image.

Pixel [] edu.ou.asgbook.filters.NHighest.findHighestValued ( LatLonGrid  input  )  

00031                                                       {
00032         // create array of pixels
00033         int[][] data = input.getData();
00034         final int initialCapacity = (input.getNumLat() * input.getNumLon())  / 10;
00035         List<Pixel> a = new ArrayList<Pixel>(initialCapacity);
00036         for (int i=0; i < input.getNumLat(); ++i){
00037             for (int j=0; j < input.getNumLon(); ++j){
00038                 if ( data[i][j] != input.getMissing() ){
00039                     a.add(new Pixel(i,j,data[i][j]));
00040                 }
00041             }
00042         }
00043         System.out.println("Finding the " + n + " highest values out of " + a.size() + " pixels");
00044         
00045         // selection sort this array to find n highest
00046         Pixel[] result = new Pixel[n];
00047         Pixel.CompareValue comparator = new Pixel.CompareValue();
00048         for (int i=0; i < n; ++i){
00049             int p = i;
00050             for (int j=i; j < a.size(); ++j){
00051                 if ( comparator.compare(a.get(j), a.get(p)) > 0 ){
00052                     p = j;
00053                 }
00054             }
00055             result[i] = a.get(p);
00056             // swap a[i] and a[p]
00057             Pixel temp = a.get(i);
00058             a.set(i, a.get(p));
00059             a.set(p, temp);
00060         }
00061         return result;
00062     }

static void edu.ou.asgbook.filters.NHighest.main ( String[]  args  )  throws Exception [static] 

00064                                                             {
00065         // read input
00066         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA);
00067         popdensity.setMissing(0); // will get to process less data this way
00068         
00069         // find 10 highest
00070         NHighest filter = new NHighest(10);
00071         Pixel[] result = filter.findHighestValued(popdensity);
00072         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00073             System.out.println(i + " " + result[i] + " loc=" + popdensity.getLocation(result[i].getX(), result[i].getY()));
00074         }
00075         
00076         // plot the result on a map
00077         popdensity.fill(popdensity.getMissing());
00078         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00079             popdensity.setValue(result[i].getX(), result[i].getY(), 1);
00080         }
00081         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("nhighest");
00082         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "highest10", PngWriter.createHotColormap());
00083         
00084         // plot as KML points
00085         List<LatLon> points = new ArrayList<LatLon>();
00086         List<String> names = new ArrayList<String>();
00087         for (int i=0; i < result.length; ++i){
00088             Pixel p = result[i];
00089             points.add( popdensity.getLocation(p.getRow(), p.getCol()));
00090             names.add("Pixel#"+ (i+1) );
00091         }
00092         KmlWriter.write(points, names, out, "top10pixels");
00093     }
